column2: A wace shekara aka haifi Donald Trump ?
Atiku Abubakar dan wani jam'iyya ne ?
A wanne watan musulmai ke yi aikin hajji ?
Shekara nawa Sarauniya Elizabeth tayi a kan mulki ?
Wanene daraktan fim din nan mai dogon zango Izzar So ?
Yaya sunan matar shugaban kasa Buhari a lokacin mulkin siyasa ?
Wanene dan takarar shugan kasar jam'iyyar NNPP a 2023?
wa ne ne shugaban Kugiyar Dattwan Arewa ACF?
